title.narrative: 4.2. EXTERNAL RELATIONS

description.narrative: Output 4.2: UNICEF staff and partners are provided tools, guidance and resources for effective communication on children's issues with stakeholders, which contributes to Communication And Advocacy, Cross-Sectoral - Human Rights, Cross-Sectoral - Other Programme Areas, Technical Excellence In Policy And Programmes. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Communications, Advocacy And Public Engagement, Operational Support To Programme Delivery. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Programme Effectiveness Outcome

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Output 4.2: UNICEF staff and partners are provided tools, guidance and resources for effective communication on children?s issueswith stakeholders

description.narrative: UNICEF received some $80K financial support as well as non-financial support with valuation of $34,400 from the private sector. The Municipality of Isfahan was recognized as the first “Child Friendly Candidate City” in Iran. Innovation Challenge was launched to address challenges faced by children due to COVID-19. The first Iranian startup was onboarded by the UNICEF Innovation Fund.;In 2021, UNICEF Iran continued to increase;the level of public and media advocacy and awareness-raising for children, specially on COVID-19 prevention and UNICEF response, by reaching out to millions in the public, media and policy-makers through the digital platforms and other events. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:06/01/2022
